vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Bene-jaakan = "sons of twisting"
an Israelite place of encampment in the wilderness (same as be.e.rot be.ne-ya.a.qan (בְּאֵרֹת בְּנֵי־יַעֲקָן "Beeroth-bene-jaakan" H0885))
vocabinfos._es_Definition: lugar a lo largo de la ruta del éxodo
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比尼亞干 这个專有名詞地名在希伯來文的意思是 "扭曲之子"
1) 以色列人在曠野紮營之一處(同 0885) (民33:31,32)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
比尼亚干 这个专有名词地名在希伯来文的意思是 "扭曲之子"
1) 以色列人在旷野扎营之一处(同 0885) (民33:31,32)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with be.ne ya.a.qan (בְּנֵי יַעֲקָ֑ן "Bene-jaakan" H1142)
§ Bene-jaakan = "sons of twisting"
an Israelite place of encampment in the wilderness (same as be.e.rot be.ne-ya.a.qan (בְּאֵרֹת בְּנֵי־יַעֲקָן "Beeroth-bene-jaakan" H0885))
